title: Drawing, "Design for a Painted Coach Panel with Rocaille Motif", ca. 1747
medium: Brush and gouache and gold paint on laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Almost symetrical rocaille motif in green, brown, and gold on tan background.  The pattern is of a swirling, looping designs with wave-like detailing.  The materials drawn for this panel appear to be simililar to jade, bronze, silver, and gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Painted Coach Panel with Rocaille Motif", ca. 1747.
ca. 1747. Brush and gouache and gold paint on laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1948-40-187.
